TextView.android:text: First you will be given new country to guess and you will try to guess the chosen word by suggesting letters occurring in the word (one letter at a time), or by suggesting the whole word. you are only allowed as many failed attempts as there are letters in the word. A failed attempt is a suggestion of a letter not occurring in the word, or of the wrong word.

If the you suggest a letter that occurs in the word, the letter is placed in all its positions in the word; otherwise the number of allowed failed attempts is decreased by one. At any time you are allowed to guess the whole word. You win when the word is completed using single letters, or the whole word is guessed correctly. You lose when the counter of allowed failed attempts reaches zero.
